summary: Presently sponsored by: 1Password Extended Access Management: Secure every sign-in for every app on every device. The conundrum I refer to in the title of this post is the one faced by a breached organisation: disclose or suppress.  And let me be even more specific: should they disclose to impacted individuals, or simply never let them know...
title: The Data Breach Disclosure Conundrum
